com.phunware.location.provider

Class PwMockLocationClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.gms.location.LocationClient
      • com.phunware.location.provider.PwMockLocationClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient

    public class PwMockLocationClient
extends com.google.android.gms.location.LocationClient
    This is a hack to get around the fact that Google Play Services overwrites the Bundle with its own bundle when using MockLocations. Use getLastLocation() instead of the passed Location in onLocationChanged()

    • Nested Class Summary
